titles.title: To amend the PROTECT Act to expand the national AMBER Alert system to territories of the United States, and for other purposes.
AMBER Alert Nationwide Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
